title: FontLab gone? ( Now Back )
content:
Is FontLab dead?

I am looking for a Font Design software solution and if I try any page but the homepage on fontlab.com I get:

————————————  
Error 500 - Internal server error

An internal server error has occured!  
Please try again later.  
————————————

Any news?

 [‹ FontForge now integrates Spiro](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905034233/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38483 "Go to previous forum topic") [How to get an OpenType icon on a OpenType TTF Flavored font file? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905034233/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29770 "Go to next forum topic")
author: section8

comments.content: odd. no one in our office can get past homepage.

You probably have FontForge in your email database :-)

ChrisL
Maybe our IT guy is pissed at FL for some reason.

You could take your Aha! I didn’t try to get past the home page. When I did I got Error 500 - Internal server error An internal server error has occured!
Please try again later. They probably need to re-boot.
I can´t get pass the homepage either. Must be a temporary error.

I tried my bookmark for it and got a failure; accessing it through their MSN Forums works.

The difference:

My bookmark is .com; the Forums is .net.

Try it.

Our ISP upgraded our server to a new box and they screwed something up, sorting it out.

A.

I always get nervous when the IT guy sends an email saying they are doing “server Maintenance”. That usually means things will be screwed up for a few days :-/

ChrisL

It’s supposedly back in action.

A.

Altogether, it works but some internal links still don’t work. Our website provider “upgraded” our server which caused to some major malfunction in our existing content management system, and we’re still fixing those problems.

Adam
